summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated July 25-26, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, leave statuses (sick, annual, LWOP, AWOL), and overtime/comp time occurrences for correctional and non-correctional staff.

persons.name: Noel T
persons.context: Listed as assigned to SHU #4 on July 26, 2019, with an 08:00-14:00 shift.

events.title: MCC Daily Staff Assignment
events.description: Routine daily assignment and shift management for correctional staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: MCC New York New York, NY
keyFacts: Document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for July 25-26, 2019.
Shows detailed post assignments (e.g., SHU, Control, Lobby, Escort) and shift changes for correctional officers and supervisors.
Records various leave statuses including Sick Leave, Annual Leave, LWOP (Leave Without Pay), LWOP(M), and AWOL.
Notes 23 Overtime Occurrences and 2 Comp-time Occurrences for the date.
Lists a total of 109 Correctional Services Staff and 11 Non-Correctional Services Staff.
